sentence.Network_en: No sooner had I uttered the words than I could have kicked myself, for I knew they would displease him.
sentence.Network_cn: 话才一出口,我就责备自己, 因为知道这些话会使他不高兴的.

sentence.Network_en: Not wishing to displease her, he avoided answering the question.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了不惹她生气，他对这个问题避而不答。

sentence.Network_en: You displease your father when you don't obey him.
sentence.Network_cn: 当你不服从你父亲时,你就会使他不高兴.

list.abs: ... [blunt] 刀不锋利 [be unhappy;be displeased] [心情]不愉快 [feel under the weather;be slightly unwell] [身体]不舒服.
...display screen 屏幕显示displease 惹恼触怒生气不快不悦不满不满意displeased with 不悦不满displeasing
the loser often gets flung into the street by his displeased owner .斗败的蟋蟀往往会被生气的主人扔到大街上。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French desplaisir, from des- (expressing reversal) + plaisir 'to please', from Latin placere

entry.tran: 使不愉快;使生气;得罪;惹怒
entry.def: If something or someone displeases you, they make you annoyed or rather angry.

example.ex: Not wishing to displease her, he avoided answering the question.
example.tran: 为了不惹她生气，他对这个问题避而不答。

auth_sentence.content: No one wants to anger or displease one's boss, even a little.
auth_sentence.res_content: No one wants to anger or displease one's boss, even a little.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No one wants to anger or displease one's boss, even a little.

auth_sentence.content: If it gets too close to Iran, it will not only displease the U.S., but also the Arab states.
auth_sentence.res_content: If it gets too close to Iran, it will not only displease the U.S., but also the Arab states.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If it gets too close to Iran, it will not only displease the U.S., but also the Arab states.

auth_sentence.content: This may displease some fans, but once you get used to it you'll see a lot of versatility is now possible.
auth_sentence.res_content: This may displease some fans, but once you get used to it you'll see a lot of versatility is now possible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This may displease some fans, but once you get used to it you'll see a lot of versatility is now possible.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人愉快的, 舒适的
stems_affixes.word_buile: pleas愉快,高兴+ant表形容词→adj.令人愉快的, 舒适的
pleas愉快,高兴+e→满足的,高兴的
pleas愉快,高兴+ed表形容词→adj.高兴的, 满足的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 愉快, 快乐, 乐事
stems_affixes.word_buile: pleas愉快,高兴+ure表名词→n.愉快, 快乐, 乐事
dis不+please[adj.满足的,高兴的 v.请]→v.使不快, 使[人]生气
pleas愉快,高兴+e→满足的,高兴的
